title: Ellen DeGeneres discovered Brad Pitt sitting in her audience
text:
(CNN) Brad Pitt surprised Ellen DeGeneres when he appeared on her show Friday as an overenthusiastic audience member.

Sitting in a pageboy cap and a blue button down, Pitt clapped and wooed along with the crowd when DeGeneres spotted him and invited him to come down and sit in her guest chair.

"I'm good," he replied, adding that he had the day off and wanted to see the show. "Carry on."

Pitt kept interrupting, asking if the Ellen Shop was open after the show and remarking, "Good. I love the underwear."

Eventually the actual guest, Sean Hayes, gave up his seat to Pitt because "those eyes." Pitt hugged DeGeneres, telling her he's a "superfan," and the two got to talking. They quickly discovered they share an ex.
